item.title: Rise Of The Cloud Hosted PBX
item.description:
Traditional, in-house PBX systems might be nearing obsolescence with the emergence of cloud-hosted solutions like AireSpring’s AirePBX. This innovation signifies a return to an older model where the service provider manages the switching system, but with modern technological advancements. This shift back to provider-managed systems, reminiscent of early telephone networks, offers significant cost advantages due to increased competition and the use of existing network infrastructure for VoIP services. Businesses no longer need to invest in separate wiring or proprietary equipment, leading to more competitive offerings and feature-rich options...
